description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

notableUses.description: Luffy stretches his arm across the water from the Thousand Sunny to Scrap Island to pull Usopp back onto the ship.
notableUses.significance: A symbolic use of Luffy's power to literally bring Usopp back to the crew, representing his ability to reach out and bring his friends together.
